rules: Rule1: If CompanyX develops DrugAlpha, then CompanyX profits.
Rule2: If CompanyX modifies DrugAlpha, then FDA approval for CompanyX results in an FDA denial for CompanyX.
Rule3: CompanyX modifies DrugAlpha or CompanyX modifies DrugBeta.
Rule4: If CompanyX modifies DrugBeta, then FDA approval for CompanyX leads to an FDA denial for CompanyX.
Rule5: If CompanyX detects severe side effects, then CompanyX does not halt the clinical trial.
Rule6: If CompanyX detects mild side effects, then CompanyX does not halt the clinical trial.
Rule7: If CompanyX acquires a competing patent, then CompanyX does not license DrugBeta.
Rule8: If CompanyX publishes StudyBeta, then CompanyX profits.
Rule9: If CompanyX tests DrugAlpha for ConditionGamma, then CompanyX develops DrugAlpha.
Rule10: CompanyX tests DrugAlpha for ConditionGamma or CompanyX tests DrugBeta for ConditionGamma.
Rule11: If CompanyX tests DrugBeta for ConditionGamma, then CompanyX synthesizes DrugBeta.
Rule12: If CompanyX uses the AITool, then synthesis of DrugBeta by CompanyX results in publication of StudyBeta by CompanyX.
Rule13: If CompanyX does not detect severe side effects and CompanyX does not detect mild side effects, then CompanyX continues the clinical trial.
Rule14: If CompanyX does not detect severe side effects and CompanyX does not detect mild side effects, then CompanyX does not continue the clinical trial.
Rule15: If CompanyX does not patent DrugAlpha and synthesis of DrugBeta by CompanyX does not lead to publication of StudyBeta by CompanyX, then CompanyX licenses DrugBeta.
Rule16: If testing DrugBeta for ConditionGamma by CompanyX does not result in publication of StudyBeta by CompanyX, then CompanyX halts the clinical trial.
Rule17: If lack of profit by CompanyX does not lead to submission of an FDA application by CompanyX, then CompanyX receives FDA approval.
Rule18: If lack of profit by CompanyX does not trigger submission of an FDA application by CompanyX, then CompanyX does not receive an FDA denial.
Rule19: If CompanyX does not use the AITool, then CompanyX uses the ManualTool.
Rule20: If CompanyX does not profit, then CompanyX does not submit an FDA application.
facts: Fact1: CompanyX acquires a competing patent.
Fact2: CompanyX does not patent DrugAlpha.
Fact3: CompanyX does not use the ManualTool.
